title: Foods: fads and facts
brief_description: Discusses the effects of pesticides, preservatives and additives on foods and illustrates how government authorities maintain adequate safety levels on foods through constant supervision of food marketing. Also considers whether organic foods have any more nutritional value than foods grown with help of scientific knowledge. Suitable for secondary level.
